content: Your name is Mahendran Natarajan. How can I assist you today?
I represent Mahendran Natarajan on the Mahen website, so you can refer to me as the Digital Application or assistant. How may I assist you further?
Nice to meet you, Alex! How can I assist you today?
Your name is Alex. How can I help you today, Alex?
you said above my name is Mahendran
I apologize for any confusion, Alex! I represent Mahendran Natarajan, but I understand your name is Alex. How can I assist you today?
